about_me.des: I am machine learning engineer with experience in toolkits like scikit-learn, Tensorflow, Keras. I began my career as a full stack web developer and I still enjoy designing User Interfaces. Python, java, node.js, mongoDb and express are my preferred programming langiuages, frameworks and database engines and I have experience in MySQL and java too. I am an extremely fast learner, hard worker and a self-motivated independent developer. I believe that with hard work and sincerity anything can be achieved. I have an affinity towards Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Deep Neural Networks, Information Retrieval, Data Mining and I aim at contributing as much as I can to these fields.

projects.saplatform: Saplatform is a automated service for operations, it has asset management, project release, database access function, it can control mass servers.
projects.jalpc: Jalpc is a simple, beautiful and swift theme for Jekyll. It has comprehensive function, it can be easily used and edited. It's adapted for many kinds devices.
projects.angularjs: It is a web font application written by Angularjs and deployed by Jekyll on github (gh-pages), the backend platform is Leancloud, you can use Parse as well.
projects.rsser: Rsser is an Ionic application, with this application we can read news and articles freely, you can add rss address from the given list and add it manually.

career.dfki: Deutsche Forschungszentrum für Künstliche Intelligenz GmbH (DFKI)
career.dfki_des: Now I am Working in the Multimedia Analysis and Data Mining team at Deutsche Forschungszentrum für Künstliche Intelligenz GmbH (DFKI) in the Multimedia Opinion Mining project. I am modelling trending events/news and analyzing them for visualizing opinions and trends in the world.
career.tukl_hci: Department of Computer Graphics & HCI, TU Kaiserslautern
career.tukl_hci_des: I worked on enhancing and maintaining the desktop client application for visualizing quality measures in automobiles for a project with Volkswagen.
career.tukl_des: I Joined the masters cource in Computer Science - Artificial Intelligence at Technische Universität Kaiserslautern.
career.tukl_job: Masters in Computer Science - Artificial Intelligence
career.rev_des: As a full stack web developer, I developed core products for Reverie and utility toolkits for internal teams. I Led a fast prototyping team of 3 for probable clients and developed and planned integration strategies with client applications. I also represented Reverie in tech events and competitions.
career.tcs_des: As a Trainee I was trained on developing enterprise standard software applications using .NET framework and managing teams and projects using Microsoft Team Foundation Server.
career.college_des: On July 2013,I graduated from college and entered the real world.
